changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO tpp_info (tpp_info_id, authorisation_number, tpp_name, authority_id, authority_name, organisation, organisation_unit, city, state, status) SELECT DISTINCT nextval('tpp_info_id_seq'), tpp_id, 'default TPP', 'default authority id', 'default authority name', 'default organisation', 'default organisation unit', 'default city', 'default state', 'ENABLED' FROM ais_consent

changeSet.author: ssh@adorsys.com.ua
changeSet.comment: Insert default Tpp Info for Mariadb
changeSet.sql: UPDATE ais_consent SET tpp_info_id = (SELECT t.tpp_info_id FROM tpp_info AS t INNER JOIN ais_consent AS a ON t.authorisation_number = a.tpp_id AND tpp_name = 'default TPP' LIMIT 1)
INSERT INTO tpp_info_role (tpp_info_id, tpp_role) SELECT DISTINCT t.tpp_info_id, 'AISP' FROM tpp_info AS t INNER JOIN ais_consent AS a ON t.authorisation_number = a.tpp_id
